IndexPage.title: next-intl example
IndexPage.description: Welcome to the Next.js Internationalization (i18n) example! This demo showcases the power of the App Router and how to manage multilingual content seamlessly using next-intl.

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Oops! It seems like you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist. Don't worry, our internationalization magic is still hard at work on other parts of the app. Feel free to navigate back to explore more!

hero.title: About our company
hero.desc: The International Expert Center is a collaborative platform that brings together experts from various fields striving to implement advanced ideas and solutions. We gather specialists, researchers, and practitioners ready to share their experience and knowledge, as well as collaborate to achieve sustainable development and innovative breakthroughs. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals with extensive experience and successful cases.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.desc: Our mission is to provide a platform for knowledge and experience exchange among experts, as well as to promote the implementation of innovative solutions in various fields. We actively work on creating quality content, conducting research, organizing events, and building cooperation networks. We believe that joint actions can lead to significant changes and growth.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.desc: We strive to create a space for cooperation and dialogue between specialists from different fields. Our goal is to form a society where knowledge and skills are effectively used to solve current problems and for overall development. We believe that through cooperation, it is possible to achieve harmony and sustainability on a global level.

list.title: Language Training/Foreign Languages
list.description: English language courses for all ages: Learn English for various purposes – from everyday communication to professional activities.

list.title: International Communication
list.description: Preparation for negotiations at various levels: Developing negotiation skills, effective communication with international partners, conflict resolution, and achieving mutually beneficial agreements.

list.title: Mentoring and Coaching
list.description: Educational courses, trainings. Masterminds and supervisions for experts/trainers. Business mentoring: Providing expert support and consultations for aspiring entrepreneurs and managers of small and medium-sized businesses. Sports coaching: Developing sports skills and achieving goals in sports through individual support and training. Sports mentoring for all categories: Supporting athletes of all levels, from beginners to professionals, in achieving their goals.

list.title: Social Adaptation and Integration
list.description: Social adaptation and post-military integration program: Providing assistance to people in social adaptation, psychological support, and integration into society.

list.title: Management Development
list.description: Enhancing the skills and competencies of leaders and managers to improve their ability to effectively manage teams, projects, and the organization as a whole. Courses, trainings, coaching, and mentoring programs tailored to the specific needs of participants.

list.title: Business Analytics and Promotion
list.description: Project analytics: Conducting project analysis to determine their effectiveness, identify risks, and develop recommendations for improvement. PR business promotion: Developing and implementing business promotion strategies, strengthening the company's reputation, and attracting new clients.

list.title: Research and Development
list.description: Publications and reports. Development of new models, methods, and concepts aimed at solving specific problems of business and society. Collaboration and partnership. Consulting. Conducting seminars and educational programs.
